name: EverQuest: Seeds of Destruction
description: EverQuest® Seeds of Destruction™ is the fifteenth expansion to the genre-defining series. For the first time in EverQuest history, players can hire non-player characters (NPCs) to aid them in their heroic endeavors. These mercenaries will be valuable player assets as they thwart the efforts of Discord's Dark God. EverQuest Seeds of Destruction also includes a level cap increase to 85, new dynamic high-level raid content, new spells, and new alternate advancement abilities.
